sections.general: INTERVENTION SPECIALIST TEACHER OF MATH AND LANGUAGE ARTS
sections.objective:
To gain the position as the resource room teacher at Howell Township Public Schools.
Summary of Qualifications
Hard-working and organized.
Demonstrated ability to design developmentally appropriate lessons and
Knowledge and respect for all students and parental
activities allowing integration of all learning styles.
rights.
Highly educated in differentiated classrooms.
Professional leadership and management skills.
Determined to maximize the educational achievement of each student.
Excellent technology skills (Word, Powerpoint,
Trained in Developmental Reading Assessments, Common Core Standards,
Smart Notebook, Achieve3000).
Standard Solutions, Wonders, Anti-Bullying.
Dedicated to continuous professional development.
